remarks: The ordering of two Hilbert lattice elements is determined by the atoms under them.  ( ~ chrelat3 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
statement:
atlatle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atlatle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atlatle.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atlatle $p |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. AtLat ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> A. p e. A ( p .<_ X -> p .<_ Y ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d K p $.
$d X p $.
$d Y p $.
